channel.title: Another HTML/CSS Template
channel.description:
Hello Hello, it's been a while since I've tried this. I remember a few things you guys told me last time and I've kept them in mind.
http://volates.com
Although, it is only the navigation atm, I'm hoping to get a bit of criticism on the spacing, size, etc. Perhaps the header is too large?
I will be updating this periodically so I'm not just asking for you to look at this is an unfinished project. I'm hoping to get most of the body done tomorrow. For now, this is what I have.

item.title: Another HTML/CSS Template
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:9, topic:367152”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=463337.msg3393319#msg3393319 date=1289133512]
It isn’t valid HTML 4.01 by the way…
[/quote]
This page seems to say otherwise: http://validator.w3.org/check?uri=volates.com[/quote]
He has apparently fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Another HTML/CSS Template
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

That’s how I feel when I get into a class. But when they started talkin’ about how people react to colors and certain placements, I was like… lolwut. That was something that I don’t want to call “new”, but something I didn’t consider all too much before.

Read full topic

item.title: Another HTML/CSS Template
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:5, topic:367152”]Someone went to school for web design! Or well, like… middle school “web design”[/quote]I am in a class tbh, but it didn’t teach me any of that. I already know everything in the class and it’s kinda lame… I’m hoping that it progresses.

Read full topic

item.title: Another HTML/CSS Template
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:3, topic:367152”]A different background color would be nice, considering that the white one is obsolete to the logo and navigation bar…
Try gray [/quote]Obsolete? White is the absence of color and can therefor almost clash with any color appeasingly well… Plus, it’s a statistically proven fact that users are more comfortable with white backgrounds and black as a secondary or font color due to it being so similar to reading text out of any ordinary exerp. Darker colors are also less user friendly and come off nonstimulous.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

A different background color would be nice, considering that the white one is obsolete to the logo and navigation bar…
Try gray

@Pwnd wrote:

So far it’s a’ight. I’d make the header image a link, that’s always nice. Other than that, not too much to base an opinion off of.
